name: A. Payment Without Change
statement:
You have a coins of value n and b coins of value 1. You always pay in
exact change, so you want to know if there exist such x and y that if
you take x (0
le x
le a) coins of value n and y (0
le y
le b) coins of value 1, then the total value of taken coins will be
S.You have to answer q independent test cases.
editorial:
Firstly, we obviously need to take at least coins of value . If we
cannot do it, the answer it . Otherwise we always can obtain the
required sum if .
